trans-unit.source: A collection of simulated energy profiles, based on 12 different building shapes. The buildings differ with respect to differentiated by 8 features, such as glazing area, the glazing area distribution, and orientation.<html></html> <html></html><html></html>Usage:<html></html> Use either regression or classification to predict the energy efficiency rating based as one of two real valued responses. For multi-class classification, is round the response variable to the nearest integer. <html></html> <html></html><html></html>Related Research:<html></html> Xifara, A. & Tsanas, A. (2012). UCI Machine Learning Repository <html></html>http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml<html></html>. Irvine, CA: University of California, School of Information and Computer Science
